definition: to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: At FutureProof we are passionate about designing sustainable buildings, landscapes and communities.
sentences.chinese: 我们热衷于设计有承受力的建筑物，园艺和社区。

sentences.english: I hope they can have some real impact on the frustration tolerance education.

sentences.english: Lowered alcohol tolerance could lead to an accident or ticket.

sentences.english: Disordered nerves and bad digestion are a common cause of backbiting.

sentences.english: For the poor, access and affordability are usually one and the same.
